DataElement.preferredName: Medical Castration Refractory Metastatic Prostate Carcinoma Asymptomatic Or Symptomatic Diagnosis Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator related to the diagnosis of a carcinoma (where symptoms may or may not be displayed) that arises from the prostate gland and has spread to other anatomic sites and which is resistant to drugs that suppress the function of the testicles.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Medical Castration Refractory Metastatic Prostate Carcinoma Asymptomatic Or Symptomatic Diagnosis
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Information related to the diagnosis of a carcinoma (where symptoms may or may not be displayed) that arises from the prostate gland and has spread to other anatomic sites and which is resistant to drugs that suppress the function of the testicles.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Medical Castration Refractory Metastatic Prostate Carcinoma
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Refers to the use of drugs to suppress the function of the ovaries or testicles.:Refractory; not responding to treatment.:A carcinoma that arises from the prostate gland and has spread to other anatomic sites.

Concepts.definition: Refers to the use of drugs to suppress the function of the ovaries or testicles.
A carcinoma that arises from the prostate gland and has spread to other anatomic sites.

Property.preferredDefinition: Having no signs or symptoms of disease.:An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.:Having to do with symptoms, which are signs of a condition or disease.:The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.

Concepts.definition: Without clinical signs or indications that raise the possibility of a particular disorder or dysfunction.

An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.
Exhibiting the symptoms of a particular disease.

The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms (NCI Glossary).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ReferenceDocuments.name: Asymptomatic or minimally sym
ReferenceDocuments.description: Asymptomatic or minimally symptomatic metastatic castration-resistant prostate cancer (mCRPC).
